HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 16 Sep 2018Cancer the cc first. This will turn off the leak from your income. Use Excel list down all your monthly spending , all cost and income. This will allow you to know where your $ goes to. Reduce your other non mandatory expenses such as restaurant , reduce cigarettes cost if you smoke, skip grab and take all public transport. If you have no contract with Telco then switch to a no sim lower monthly subscription plan. Reduce daily food expenses. Doing all the above will allow you to squeeze out at least $100 to $200. Use this to repay your 3k faster. Do part-time job such as delivery for the food apps (foodpanda, honest bee etc) or any other part time. With the extra income , it can help reduce your 3k faster. All in all doing the above will help repay your 3k debts within a year or even faster like 6 months , depends on how desperate you're willing to do to quickly repay the debts. ‚ÄãAll the best !
